groveR

The goal of groveR is to …

Installation

You can install the released version of groveR from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dbca-wa/groveR")
library(groveR)

Help Files

All functions within rivRmon have the usual R help files, however the best place to see these and some vignettes is the groveR website
